sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import GroupsData from "./GroupsData"; import { FaChevronCircleRight, FaRegThumbsUp, FaComment, FaShare, FaGlobeAmericas, FaEllipsisH, } from "react-icons/fa"; function Groups() { const [like, setLike] = useState(false); const [share, setshare] = useState(false); return ( <>
{GroupsData.map((Group) => { return (
{Group.userName} {Group.groupName}

{Group.PostedTime}

{Group.postText}

{ //Check if Video url is empty then show image if it is available. (Group.postedVideo === '') ? : //else show video
setLike(!like)} className={like ? "toggled_like_comment_share" : "d-block"}>
Like
Comment
setshare(!share)} className={share ? "toggled_like_comment_share" : "d-block"}>
Share
); })}
) } export default Groups;
